郓字的基本解释

郓
（鄆）
yùn
〔郓城〕地名，在中国山东省。
（鄆）

郓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yùn］
［《廣韻》王問切，去問，云。］
“郓1”的繁体字。
(1)春秋鲁邑名。有东西二处。《春秋·文公十二年》：“季孫行父帥師城諸及鄆。”杜预注：“鄆，莒魯所争也。陽城姑暮縣南有員亭。員，即鄆也。”此为东郓。本莒地，后归鲁。在今山东沂水北。
(2)春秋鲁邑名。有东西二处。《春秋·成公四年》：“冬，城鄆。”杨伯峻注：“﹝魯有二鄆﹞此則西鄆……在今山東鄆城縣東十六里。”
(3)古州名。隋开皇十年置。治所在万安。唐移治须昌。宋移治须城，辖境缩小。宋宣和元年升为东平府。

郓字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　鄆； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1271第12
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】王問切【正韻】禹問切，?音運。魯地名。【春秋·文十二年】城諸及鄆。【註】莒、魯所爭者，以其遠逼外國，故帥師城之。又【成四年】冬城鄆。【註】公欲叛晉，故城而爲備。又【九年】楚公子嬰齊帥師伐莒，莒潰，楚人入鄆。【註】鄆，莒別邑。又【十六年】晉人執季孫行父，公還待于鄆。【註】魯西邑東郡廩丘縣有鄆城。又【襄十二年】莒人伐我東鄙，圍台，季孫宿帥師救台，遂入鄆。又【昭元年】取鄆。【左傳】趙孟曰：魯、莒爭鄆，爲日久矣。又【二十六年】公至自齊，居于鄆。【六書故】春秋有二鄆，莒在魯東，莒、魯所爭，東鄆也。公待于鄆者，西鄆也。文公城諸及鄆，不聞與莒爭，及成公時，楚伐莒入鄆，則鄆自爲莒邑，而四年所城者西鄆也。　又州名。【韻會】古兗州之域，魯附庸國，漢爲東平國，隋置鄆州。　又【集韻】河內沁水鄕名。　又姓。【廣韻】魯大夫，食采于鄆，後因氏。　又【集韻】于分切，音云。義同。

考證：〔【春秋·成九年】楚公子嬰齊帥師

Yun
Basic explanation of words
Yun
(Yun)
yùn
[Yuncheng] The place name is in Shandong Province, China.
(Yun)
Yun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yùn］
["Guangyun" Wang Wenqie, go and ask, Yun. ]
Traditional characters for "郓1".
(1) The name of Luyi in Spring and Autumn Period. There are two things. "The Twelve Years of the Spring and Autumn Period of Wengong": "Father of Ji Sun Xing handsomely teaches Zhuji Yun." Du pre-note: "Yun, Julu is contending for. There is a pavilion in the south of Gumu County, Yangcheng. Yuan is Yunye. This is Dong Yun. Originally Judi, and later returned to Lu. In today's Yishui North, Shandong.
(2) The name of Luyi in Spring and Autumn Period. There are two things. "Spring and Autumn·Four Years of Chenggong": "Winter, Chengyun." Yang Bojun's note: "﹝Lu has two Yun﹞this is Xiyun...in today’s east sixteen li in Yuncheng County, Shandong."
(3) The name of the ancient state. Sui Kaihuang was home for ten years. The governance is in Wan'an. Tang Yizhi Xuchang. Song moved to rule Xucheng, and its jurisdiction was reduced. Song Xuanhe was promoted to Dongping Mansion in the first year.
Yun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　郓; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1271 Page 12
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Wang Wenqie [Zheng Yun] Yu Wenqie,? Yinyun. Lu place name. [Spring and Autumn·Wen Twelve Years] Cheng Zhuji Yun. [Note] Ju and Lu contend that they are far outstripping foreign countries, so Shuaishicheng is the leader. Another 【Four Years】Winter City Yun. [Note] If the public wants to rebel against Jin, the old city is prepared. [Nine Years] Chu Gongziying Qi Shuai master cut Ju, Ju collapsed, Chu people entered Yun. [Note] Yun, Jubieyi. Also [sixteen years] Jin people hold Ji Sun Xingfu, but the public is still waiting in Yun. [Note] There is Yuncheng in Linqiu County, East County of Luxi County. [Xiang Twelve Years] The people of Ju defeated me and encircled the Taiwan, and Ji Sun Su Shuai rescued the Taiwan, and then entered Yun. Also [Zhaoyuan Year] take Yun. [Zuo Zhuan] Zhao Meng said: Lu and Ju are fighting for a long time. Also [twenty-six years] Gongzhi Ziqi, living in Yun. [The Six Ancient Books] There are two Yuns in the Spring and Autumn Period. Ju is in Ludong, and Ju and Lu are contending with each other, and Dong Yun is also. Those who treat Yun publicly, Xi Yun also. Zhuji Yun in Wengong City did not hesitate to fight with Ju, and when he became the public, Chu defeated Ju into Yun, and Yun himself was Juyi, and Xi Yun was the one who had been in the city for four years.　Also the name of the state. [Rhyme Club] The domain of ancient Yanzhou, the vassal state of Lu, the state of Dongping in the Han Dynasty, and the state of Yunzhou in the Sui Dynasty.　[Jiyun] The name of Qinshui in Hanoi.　Another last name. [Guang Yun] Dr. Lu, who eats food from Yun, Hou Yinshi.　[Jiyun] In the division, the sound cloud. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Spring and Autumn·Nine Years] Chu Gongziying Qi Shuaishi
